name: Moto Racing 2016: Crazy Moto Racer
description:
Moto Racing 2016 - Crazy Moto Racer Game is a free motorcycle game with simple control, nice graphics and gameplay!!!
With Crazy Moto Racer Game you Can drive your moto through traffic and enjoy the most exhilarating moto racing game on your smartphone.
-You will be riding your Custom Moto around on a Dangerous Highway!!!
-You can choose different super Motorcycles!!!
- Tilt to Turn and Tap to accelerate!!!
Features:
- tap to accelerate
- auto speed ups
- collect coins and magnets to buy better motos

Thank for play Moto Racing 2016 : Crazy Moto Racer Game
